entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.0 Released
entry.summary: Quartz.NET 2.0 has finally been released. Quartz.NET 2.0 introduces a new more interfaced based model of operating with the API, lots of performance improvements and bug fixes to issues found in 1.0.x line.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.0.1 Released
entry.summary: ObjectUtils.SetPropertyValue fails with explicitly implemented interface members

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.1 Released
entry.summary: NthIncludedDayTrigger was removed as it was accidentally left behind even though being legacy and replaced by DailyTimeIntervalTrigger.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.1.2 Released
entry.summary: This is a maintenance release fixing issue where .NET 4.0 DLLs required 4.5 runtime due to ilmerge missing special framework parameter.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.2 Released
entry.summary: this script adds a new column SCHEDTIME to table QRTZFIRED_TRIGGERS file contains the alter command for SQL Server and other database samples in comments

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.2.1 Released
entry.summary: Quarts server does not properly log possible exception when starting the service DailyTimeIntervalTrigger GetFireTimeAfter produces incorrect result when date is in the past batchTriggerAcquisitionMaxCount acquires one trigger unless batchTriggerAcquisitionFireAheadTimeWindow is also set Oracle ODP Managed provider should set BindByName to true for OracleCommands

entry.title: Website has moved to using GitHub pages
The tutorial has been updated to include 2.x API changes
entry.summary: With the latest switch to GitHub Pages it's been a joy to create content. There tutorial has now been split to two separate tutorials for Quartz.NET 1.x and 2.x respectively.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.2.2 Released
entry.summary: Make SQL Server table create script Azure SQL compliant Add missing clustered index for QRTZBLOBTRIGGERS table ** You need to manually add this to existing installation (tables created with old script), see ALTER TABLE [dbo].QRTZBLOBTRIGGERS WITH NOCHECK ADD... in script

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.3 Released
entry.summary: This is a bug fix release with some changes that warrant a minor version increment.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.3.1 Released
entry.summary: under .NET 4.0 should now be finally fixed.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 2.3.2 Released
entry.summary: CalendarIntervalTrigger and DailyTimeIntervalTrigger produce incorrect schedule builders Incorrect multiplication factor in DailyTimeIntervalScheduleBuilder.EndingDailyAfterCount() AnnualCalendar SetDayExcluded does not update internal data structures if base calendar excludes date Ensure IDriverDelegate members in StdAdoDelegate are virtual Several XML documentation spelling error fixes

entry.title: Quartz.NET 3.0 Alpha 1 Released
entry.summary: This is the first alpha release from the long-awaited v3 branch. This is a big overhaul (and still in progress). Internals are being modernized whilst still trying to keep sane upgrade path.

entry.title: Quartz.NET 3.0 Alpha 2 Released
entry.summary: This is the second alpha of v3. This release fixes problems with schedule signaling when AdoJobStore is in use. This release removes the last bits of Quartz's usage of thread local storage and thus makes async-based operations a lot safer.
